title: Frame Rate Capped at 60fps with the in game settings at uncapped
body: I got 250fps on very high settings a while back and it was a consistent fps that didn't have fps drops. The fps I have on league currently is capped at 60fps. After checking my settings, my fps was still "uncapped". Also, Vsync isn't on. Anyone have a fix?

replies.body: FPS issues can generally be resolved by tuning up your PC settings.  For example, you might have outdated drivers that can be causing a reduction.  I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help restore your gameplay.  Hopefully that will fix things up!
